rules_text:
Flash
[i]Amatsu[/i] – When Yen'fay, Blade Legend enters, you may have him fight up to one target creature. If you do, he gains indestructible until end of turn.
[i]Crit[/i] – Whenever Yen'fay deals combat damage to a player, put a thunder counter on him.
[i]Gaping Wound[/i] – When Yen'fay leaves, he deals X damage to each opponent where X is the number of counters on him.
